publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6125 Claire Baker: Congratulations to Fife Gymnasts—That the Parliament congratulates Mountfleurie Primary School pupils Robyn McIvor, Amber Strachan, Alexandria Simpson and Ashley Cameron who were named champions at the Scottish Schools Floor and Vault Championship finals held in Bells Sports Centre, Perth, on 21 March 2010; notes that 400 gymnasts representing 62 Scottish primary and secondary schools took part; recognises that the competition is the largest in the schools’ gymnastics calendar, coming at the end of 13 regional heats; recognises that the gymnasts trained for several months at an after-school club and won the Level 1 Primary category at the Fife heat to automatically qualify for the finals, and further congratulates Mountfleurie Primary School staff, Active Schools Fife staff and parent volunteers who contributed to the team’s success.
S3M-6125 Congratulations to Fife Gymnasts (lodged on 12 April 2010) Rhona Brankin*, Mary Mulligan*, John Park*, Sarah Boyack*, Jackie Baillie*
